name: Energy reading
description: The current value of the device powering the meter

name: Pipe condition
description: The condition of the discharge pipe from 0 to 100 with 0 needing replacement.

name: Meter working
description: Indicates if the meter is working or not with any value other than 0 true.

name: Pipe obstruction
description: Observation of obstructed pipe with any value other than 0 true.

name: DTW BGS
description: Depth to water below ground surface
